alert.note: Alert for Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Taylor and northern Runnels Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wilmeth, or near Wingate, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Winters, Lawn, Hatchel, Wingate, Bradshaw, Drasco, Pumphrey, Wilmeth, Lake Winters Lake and Ovalo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
